minidraw.framework
Interface SelectionHandler

All Known Subinterfaces:
Drawing
All Known Implementing Classes:
StandardDrawing, StandardSelectionHandler
public interface SelectionHandler

The selection handler role defines the interface for the responsiblity of managing a drawing's multiple figure selection mechanism. Responsibility A) Act as a collection of figures presently selected in a drawing. Author: Henrik Bærbak Christensen

Method Summary
 void addToSelection(Figure figure)
          Adds a figure to the current selection.
 void clearSelection()
          Clears the current selection.
 void removeFromSelection(Figure figure)
          Removes a figure from the selection.
 java.util.List<Figure> selection()
          Get an iterator over all selected figures
 void toggleSelection(Figure figure)
          If a figure isn't selected it is added to the selection.

addToSelection

void addToSelection(Figure figure)
Adds a figure to the current selection.

Parameters:

removeFromSelection

void removeFromSelection(Figure figure)
Removes a figure from the selection.

Parameters:

toggleSelection

void toggleSelection(Figure figure)
If a figure isn't selected it is added to the selection. Otherwise it is removed from the selection.

Parameters:
figure - the figure to toggle

clearSelection

void clearSelection()
Clears the current selection.
